title: The SMARTEST Watercooling I Have Ever Seen - iBUYPOWER Element CL
description:
Thanks to iBUYPOWER for sponsoring today’s video! Check out the new Element CL Plus and the full line of Element CL hard-line liquid-cooled gaming PCs at https://ibp.gg/scecl

iBUYPOWER is a leader in cost-effective pre-built PC's. The Element CL provides the beauty of hard-line custom cooling without the high price.
